name: HealthBehaviorServiceCPT
title: Health Behavior Service (CPT)
description: This code set includes all CPT billing codes for all Health and Behavior encounters including those for initial evaluation, re-evaluation and either individual, group, or family interventions.
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains CPT billing codes  
used for encounters for the assessment of, and all inventions for, psychological, behavior, emotional, cognitive, and social factors important to the prevention, treatment, or management of physical health problems.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who receive an assessment or any intervention for non-medical factors contributing to health problems. This element may map to the "Encounter" category of the Quality Data Model.),(Inclusion Criteria: Include assessment, reassessment and all intervention procedures.),(Exclusion Criteria: Exclude codes used to bill for additional time.)

concept.display: Health behavior assessment, or re-assessment (ie, health-focused clinical interview, behavioral observations, clinical decision making)
Health behavior intervention, individual, face-to-face; initial 30 minutes
Health behavior intervention, group (2 or more patients), face-to-face; initial 30 minutes
Health behavior intervention, family (with the patient present), face-to-face; initial 30 minutes
Health behavior intervention, family (without the patient present), face-to-face; initial 30 minutes

contains.display: Health behavior assessment, or re-assessment (ie, health-focused clinical interview, behavioral observations, clinical decision making)
Health behavior intervention, individual, face-to-face; initial 30 minutes
Health behavior intervention, group (2 or more patients), face-to-face; initial 30 minutes
Health behavior intervention, family (with the patient present), face-to-face; initial 30 minutes
Health behavior intervention, family (without the patient present), face-to-face; initial 30 minutes
